name: Black Friday 560 (TTJ7)
description:
Beat The Mob, Grab The Sales!

Made to fit in 2 Tweets for TweetTweetJam7, using 560 Characters.

The numbers in the corner show how many sales have appeared, and how many you reached before too many other shoppers (9) took them all first!

You control the beige character, against a mob of others. 

Arrow keys to walk around. ⬅️⬆️➡️⬇️
